dc:title: USPSTF Knowledgebase for Cardiovascular Disorders and Metabolic, nutritional, and Endocrine Conditions recommendations
dc:description: This knowledgebase includes recommendations grade A and B for adults from USPSTF recommendation categories Cardiovascular Disorders and Metabolic, nutritional, and Endocrine Conditions

schema:creator.schema:affiliation: Knowledge Systems Lab, University of Michigan Medical School

koio:hasDocumentation.dc:title: Using the Prediabetes and Type 2 Diabetes Screening Knowledge Object: A Step-by-Step Tutorial
koio:hasDocumentation.dc:description: Use our Jupiter Notebook on our Google Colab page for a step-by-Step tutorial on using USPSTF knowledgebase Package.
